Class: Layer

Layer

new Layer(numNeurons, addBiasopt)

Creates a single dimension Layer of Neurons.

Creates a single dimension Layer of Neurons.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
numNeurons string

The number of Neurons this Layer should have.
addBias boolean <optional>
 false

Add a bias Neuron to this Layer.

connect(targetLayer)

Connects every Neuron in this Layer to each Neuron in the target Layer.

Connects every Neuron in this Layer to each Neuron in the target Layer.

Source:
  • Layer.js, line 34

train(outputsopt)

Train the Neurons in this layer.

Train the Neurons in this layer. If target outputs are specified, the Neurons will learn to output these values. This is only useful for output Layers.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
outputs Array.<number> <optional>

Map of target output values for each Neuron.
